data.label: Home
data.description: I was born and raised in the welsh valleys

data.label: Hobbies
data.description: I was part of several orchestras and ensembles

data.label: Other early interests
data.description: I learned to sing dance and act

data.label: University
data.description: I trained as a documentary photographer in Cardiff

data.label: Artistic Focus
data.description: I documented religious communities and exhibited in galleries

data.label: The path not taken
data.description: I had an unconditional offer from Goldsmiths Unversity to study Compitational Art

data.label: The path I chose
data.description: I retrained as a software engineer on a bootcamp

data.label: Relocation & Rebirth
data.description: I accepted a job offer from Deloitte and relocated to my own flat in Bristol

data.label: Learning on the job
data.description: My clients included Dyson and Mclaren F1

data.label: Covid hit...
data.description: then year later, Our fixed term contracts dried up. However, I was ready to move on

data.label: In my defence...
data.description: I signed a contract with Raytheon as a full stack developer

data.label: An opertunity i couldn't refuse
data.description: I was offered a position at Cureoscity, an exciting new startup

data.label: Personal development
data.description: More than a year of hard work and responsive feedback lead to good things

data.label: Today
data.description: I am still here. I still have much to learn
